name: Rocker (Vinek)
description:
Welcome to Neo-Frankfürt!
The year is XX87, you're a young man named Nat' on your way to defeat the evil mayor Vova threatening your family. Use your electric sparks to jump, attack or shield yourself from the evil fruit bots and robo-ducks to reach the mayor's lair!

Use the arrows to move and jump and A, Z and E to respectively shoot, generate shields and create aeriel bumpers!

This game was made by a single student with the help of his classmates as an end-of-the-year realisation for  his first year at the school ETPA Montpellier
